specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > Nap Nep yarn is intentionally created during the spinning process by adding small knots or fiber clumps to the yarn, in order to produce a visually textured appearance.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use T-shirts
